mdRecord.dcterms:title: Family Correspondence and Personal Letter Sent from Snowville
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Family correspondence, personal letter dated May 1861, to “My Dear Dr.,” from his wife Ellen sent from Snowville, Virginia, 1 original piece, 4 pages written.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
